channel.title: Hey What!?
channel.description: The mindless ramblings of a middle-aged Pakimerican dad. Blogs relating to my personal development which includes growing spiritualy, physically and emotionally. Lots of ramblings about the world including topics related to Intermittent Fasting, working out, eating healthy, meditation and other special interests.

item.title: Richmond COVID-19 Update
item.description: Where do I stand regarding the virus? - The world seems to be going crazy. I can’t recall a time where things could be stranger. It seems like all of the post-apocalyptic movies and stories we read are all coming true. Although it’s only been a short few weeks, the world outside my window is far different than...

item.title: Test markdown
item.description: Each post also has a subtitle - You can write regular markdown here and Jekyll will automatically convert it to a nice webpage. I strongly encourage you to take 5 minutes to learn how to write in markdown - it’ll teach you how to transform regular text into bold/italics/headings/tables/etc. Here is some bold text Here is a...

item.title: Flake it till you make it
item.description: Excerpt from Soulshaping by Jeff Brown - Under what circumstances should we step off a path? When is it essential that we finish what we start? If I bought a bag of peanuts and had an allergic reaction, no one would fault me if I threw it out. If I ended a relationship with a woman who...
